module.description: The HiPay module allows you to manage your online transactions without a distance-selling (VAD) contract and with an integrated anti-fraud system
module.description_full: The HiPay module allows you to manage your online transactions without a distance-selling (VAD) contract and with an integrated anti-fraud system. Via this module, you can access all international and local payment solutions (Visa, MasterCard, ING, Bancontact Mistercash, Sofort, Payshop, Boleto bancario, Ideal, Sisal, Qiwi, Yand etc.)
module.author: Prestashop

module.name: moneybookers
module.description: Over 36 million account holders already trust Skrill
module.description_full: Over 36 million account holders already trust Skrill. Our customers can send and receive money worldwide in 200 countries and 40 currencies, securely and at low cost, without revealing their personal financial details.﻿ SIGN UP NOW
module.additional_description: More than 158,000 merchants use Skrill – here’s why: No set up or monthly fees Process credit and debit card payments Up to 100 additional local payment options Highest security standards (PCI DSS level 1) Anti-fraud checks included Free set up within 72 hours

module.name: ebay
module.description: Easily export your products from PrestaShop to eBay, one of the world’s largest marketplaces, to win new customers and help accelerate your sales
module.description_full: Easily export your products from PrestaShop to eBay, one of the world’s largest marketplaces, to win new customers and help accelerate your sales
module.additional_description: •You could develop a profitable sales channel using eBay as a new route to market. •Your products will reach a global audience of over a hundred million potential buyers. •You can create listings and sell across both channels from one place. •You’ll be able to manage all of your orders across channels helping to prevent over selling.

module.name: nqgatewayneteven
module.description: Neteven, your complete solution for European marketplace distribution. Use the PrestaShop module for the most complete marketplace management tool on the market
module.description_full: Neteven, your complete solution for European marketplace distribution. Use the PrestaShop module for the most complete marketplace management tool on the market. By synchronising your PrestaShop website with Neteven, managing the entire sales cycle becomes simple and integrated. Enjoy personalised support and exclusive functionalities.
module.additional_description: NETEVEN, SOFTWARE AND SERVICES FOR EUROPEAN MARKETPLACE MANAGEMENT Use the Neteven module for the most complete marketplace management tool on the market By synchronising your PrestaShop website with Neteven, managing the entire sales cycle becomes simple and integrated. Distribute your catalogue on the biggest e-commerce websites in Europe from a single interface. Thanks to the PrestaShop-Neteven partnership, you will finally be able to sell efficiently and effectively on the biggest European marketplaces: Amazon - eBay - PriceMinister - Cdiscount - Fnac - RueDuCommerce - Pixmania - SFR - Atosho - LaRedoute - BrandAlley - OneWorldAvenue - Zalando - Play - Otto - Rakuten... SERVICES AND SUPPORT FOR DISTRIBUTION Rely on Neteven’s team of marketplace experts to sell bigger and better! Choose from a multitude of services to outsource your e-commerce distribution!

module.name: firstdata
module.description: Accept Credit card payments today with First Data (Visa, Mastercard, Amex, Discover, etc.)﻿! Fast. Secure. Reliable
module.description_full: Accept Credit card payments today with First Data (Visa, Mastercard, Amex, Discover, etc.)﻿! Fast. Secure. Reliable. PrestaShop and First Data have teamed up as industry leaders to help your business save money in online payment acceptance. With over 40 years of payment processing experience, Express Merchant Processing Solutions (EMPS) — powered by First Data has helped millions of businesses like yours bring fast, secure, effortless payments to their customers and affordable support—regardless of size.﻿

module.name: pagseguro
module.description: PagSeguro is a UOL Group company and market leader as a payment intermediary in Brazil
module.description_full: PagSeguro is a UOL Group company and market leader as a payment intermediary in Brazil. With PagSeguro, your virtual store has the possibility to offer the same payment conditions when compared to large retailers. PagSeguro offers perfect integration with PrestaShop, ensuring agility in the development of your virtual store.﻿

module.name: paypalusa
module.description: PayPal is the fast, easy, secure way to accept payments online in 24 currencies from 193 countries around the globe. Your customers don't need a PayPal account to pay, and you get paid quickly
module.description_full: PayPal is the fast, easy, secure way to accept payments online in 24 currencies from 193 countries around the globe. Your customers don't need a PayPal account to pay, and you get paid quickly.﻿ Get started by setting up a PayPal Business account. Sign up now!﻿

module.name: prediggo
module.description: Through this module, Prediggo is offering you the possibility to increase your conversion rate by 30%. How? Sell Smarter
module.description_full: Through this module, Prediggo is offering you the possibility to increase your conversion rate by 30%. How? Sell Smarter. ﻿
module.author: Prestashop

module.name: browsi
module.description: Increase customer engagement, drive more traffic and sell more on mobile! Brow.si powers engaging mobile shopping experiences
module.description_full: Increase customer engagement, drive more traffic and sell more on mobile! Brow.si powers engaging mobile shopping experiences. This free module developed for PrestaShop seamlessly adds powerful features to your online store when accessed from a mobile device to help your customers easily search, discover, share and purchase your products wherever they are on your site. Get Brow.si on your site - it's free!
module.additional_description: While it’s no secret that more and more consumers use their mobile phones to discover and purchase products online, the mobile web browsing experience is broken and inconsistent, resulting in customer frustration, lack of engagement and loss of revenues for you the merchant. Brow.si fixes the broken mobile web by making key elements of the mobile browsing experience clear, consistent and useful for consumers. This results in more people taking action with respect to your brand, content and products.﻿
module.author: Prestashop

module.name: paymentsense
module.description: PaymentSense make it simple for your business to take credit and debit card payments online
module.description_full: PaymentSense make it simple for your business to take credit and debit card payments online. We’re the UK’s largest merchant service provider and the only company that can have your site ready to accept credit and debit card payments within 24 hours. Our payment gateway module provides you with a reliable and affordable way to accept card payments through your site. We’re the UK’s largest merchant service provider and the only company that can have your site ready to accept credit and debit card payments within 24 hours.
module.author: Prestashop

module.name: adyen
module.description: Adyen supports over 224 payment methods worldwide, and connects to 87 acquirers. With the Adyen plug-in you can accept payments online, mobile and at the point-of-sale
module.description_full: Adyen supports over 224 payment methods worldwide, and connects to 87 acquirers. With the Adyen plug-in you can accept payments online, mobile and at the point-of-sale. Risk management is included, as is full reporting and reconciliation. ﻿ Sign up
module.additional_description: Adyen is a leading provider of omni-channel payment solutions with over 250 payment methods and 187 transaction currencies. By operating from a single, Internet-based platform we make it easy for businesses to accept payments worldwide.
module.author: Prestashop

module.name: shopgate
module.description: Shopgate allows you to get a mobile site for your store as well as iOS and Android Apps! Our solution is recommended by PrestaShop as it is perfectly integrated with your system through a simple plugi
module.description_full: Shopgate allows you to get a mobile site for your store as well as iOS and Android Apps! Our solution is recommended by PrestaShop as it is perfectly integrated with your system through a simple plugin. Integrating your shop takes a few hours with no investment! Benefit now from PrestaShop special offer to create your account! For the US.For the UK.
module.additional_description: This is the fastest way for your customers to find what they seek. With Shopgate, your mobile visitors will become customers: fast loading, optimised for touch screens, clear navigation, optimal mobile payment methods, SEO and branch locator with GPS.
module.author: Prestashop

module.name: realexredirect
module.description: Realex Payments Redirect for Prestashop enables you to process transactions from all major credit and debit cards through our Hosted Payment Page
module.description_full: Realex Payments Redirect for Prestashop enables you to process transactions from all major credit and debit cards through our Hosted Payment Page. If you don't already have a Realex account, you may apply for one on our website or call us on 020 3178 5370. ﻿ SIGN UP NOW﻿
module.additional_description: Download for free to benefit from great features such as: Unrivalled Customer Support﻿﻿ 3DSecure & Fraud Card Storage (RealVault) Dynamic Currency Conversion
module.author: Prestashop

module.name: bluepay
module.description: The BluePay module supports both credit card and ACH transactions with optional saved payments. Payments can be processed through either the standard hosted page or iframe
module.description_full: The BluePay module supports both credit card and ACH transactions with optional saved payments. Payments can be processed through either the standard hosted page or iframe.
module.author: Prestashop

module.name: incentivibe
module.description: Virally grow email subscribers & fans by offering your visitors $500 prizes for only $25
module.description_full: Virally grow email subscribers & fans by offering your visitors $500 prizes for only $25. How? Incentivibe groups businesses so you can offer $500 prize on your website by sharing a fraction of prize cost (e.g. $25) with other businesses.
module.additional_description: Virally grow email subscribers and fans with $500 prizes for $25 (14-DAY FREE TRIAL)﻿ Virally grow email subscribers & fans by offering your visitors $500 prizes for only $25. How? Incentivibe groups businesses so you can offer $500 prize on your website by sharing a fraction of prize cost (e.g. $25) with other businesses. ﻿ **Start Free Trial – Promo:** Get 20% off and Win $1,000 Facebook advertising. To enter contest, start the 14-day free trial before November 15th. See amazing Testimonials below. Set-up within seconds!﻿
module.author: Prestashop

module.name: ferbuy
module.description: FerBuy is a payment method allowing merchants to offer risk free payments by invoice and in installments
module.description_full: FerBuy is a payment method allowing merchants to offer risk free payments by invoice and in installments.﻿
module.additional_description: The installation and configuration is fast and simple.﻿ As a merchant you can use FerBuy to benefit from more sales and a higher average purchase value. Your customers can pay later and they don’t have to use a credit card to check out. FerBuy comes at low fees for merchants giving you more margin on your sales. As FerBuy takes the risk for all approved transactions, there will be no risk for you as a merchant.
module.author: Prestashop

module.name: gointerpay
module.description: Increase conversions with the GoInterpay international checkout solution. Includes local pricing, payment processing and international shipping with fully landed costs all in one module
module.description_full: Increase conversions with the GoInterpay international checkout solution. Includes local pricing, payment processing and international shipping with fully landed costs all in one module. All with no fraud risk to the merchant.
module.additional_description: With GoInterpay, your international shoppers will be able to shop and pay in their local currency, see guaranteed landed cost and pay with one of over 100 supported local payment methods -all fraud free.
module.author: Prestashop

module.name: textmaster
module.description: Start selling abroad and increasing your revenues! With the TextMaster module, your product pages are translated or proofread by native-speaking experts into 10 languages
module.description_full: Start selling abroad and increasing your revenues! With the TextMaster module, your product pages are translated or proofread by native-speaking experts into 10 languages.﻿ Sign up
module.additional_description: Here are a few ways that TextMaster makes your life easier: High quality content guaranteed Rigorous selection process - we only take the best experts! Available 24/7 from anywhere in the world Translation into 10 languages Experts in 100+ of subjects 2 levels of service that match your project Regular Level: Experienced Translator/Proofreader (Translation 0.03€/word - Proofreading: 0.015€/word) Premium Level: Expert Translator/Proofreader (Translation 0.06€/word - Proofreading: 0.03€/word) Very fast delivery time (12 hours on average) Intuitive platform for specific or large tasks Flexible, competitive rates based the size and frequency of your order
module.author: Prestashop

module.name: sofortbanking
module.description: Attract more customers by offering SOFORT Banking as an additional payment method in your checkout!
module.description_full: Attract more customers by offering SOFORT Banking as an additional payment method in your checkout!
module.additional_description: Attractive conditions Easy integration No registration required for your customers Accustomed use of your customers’ familiar online banking details Security thanks to a multi-level online banking authentication procedure Real-time transaction confirmation
module.author: Prestashop

module.name: trustpilot
module.description: Start to collect reviews now and take the control of your online reputation with Trustpilot
module.description_full: Start to collect reviews now and take the control of your online reputation with Trustpilot. Engage the conversation and share your reviews on Google, Facebook, your website and on your public portal!﻿
module.additional_description: Trustpilot is the global standard for online trust. Trustpilot enables customer centric businesses like yours to collect reviews, engage with consumers and share your most powerful marketing asset – real customers’ positive experiences. Using the Trustpilot Solution to collect and display reviews is one of the most effective ways to build trust, confidence and credibility for your online store. Trustpilots agreement with Google means that the reviews you collect feed directly into your Google seller rating account. The power of displaying quality verified reviews in a prominent position through the customer journey via our easy to use widget is undeniable. Displaying reviews on site is proven to decrease shopping cart abandonment, increase basket sizes and most importantly increases sales conversions. With a few simple steps, Trustpilots simple integration with Prestashop, means in a matter of minutes you too can share your real customer’s great shopping experiences to potential buyers.
module.author: Prestashop

module.name: ecopresto
module.description: Ecopresto dropshipping is a platform that allows you to integrate many products in your shop in a few clicks
module.description_full: Ecopresto dropshipping is a platform that allows you to integrate many products in your shop in a few clicks. Simplify your sourcing and delegate your logistics!﻿ Contact the Sales Department by email Ecopresto info@ecopresto.com or phone +33 (0)2 51 44 82 17 This module requires a subscription to Ecopresto dropshipping services once downloaded﻿ from 149 euros per quarter ﻿﻿
module.additional_description: Dropshipping is an original method of delivery where your supplier delivers your package﻿ directly to your customers on your behalf. Ecopresto, the ﻿French ﻿Dropshipping platform will assist you in your success.
module.author: Prestashop

module.name: feedaty
module.description: With the Feedaty Prestashop Module you can collect and manage Customer Reviews from your customers on your e-shop
module.description_full: With the Feedaty Prestashop Module you can collect and manage Customer Reviews from your customers on your e-shop. Collecting and publishing Authentic Reviews will help grow customers’ trust towards your store, increasing visibility and conversion rates and boosting your business.
module.additional_description: ﻿Highlight and analyse strengths and weaknesses for your activity Publish the special Certification Seal, guaranteeing authenticity and trustability of the reviews Increase visibility on search engines with dedicated Feedaty Merchant Certificate pages You can rely on Feedaty’s customer support in any phase
module.author: Prestashop

module.name: alliance3
module.description: Alliance Processing is an experienced leader in High Risk global merchant transaction processing solutions onshore and off
module.description_full: Alliance Processing is an experienced leader in High Risk global merchant transaction processing solutions onshore and off. Our years of industry experience allow Alliance to offer unique processing relationships that merchants would not be able to access by going to the bank directly. We strive to be the preferred Credit Card and ACH Processing Provider for high risk eCommerce companies who look to expert advice and need more attractive solutions for any online business.
module.additional_description: In-house World Class Customer Support Dedicated account representative Free payment Gateway Onshore and off Shore solutions Same Day Approvals
module.author: Prestashop

module.description: Give.it displays a gifting button next your products. Let your customers purchase your products as gifts and send them to their friends via social media
module.description_full: Give.it displays a gifting button next your products. Let your customers purchase your products as gifts and send them to their friends via social media.
